meta.title: From DOROTHY to GALE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: A murder has been committed at our Halloween party! Seven witnesses (in costume) have given testimony, in the form of Raddles. Our fourth witness is Dorothy Gale, who clicked her heels and offered up one piece of the solution, before heading home. She also gave a hint: each witness is contributing one letter of the answer. [Update: the solution [can be found here](/mystery/whodunit)]
